articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The Israeli military ordered residents of 23 southern Lebanese villages on Saturday to evacuate to areas north of the Awali River, which flows from the western Bekaa Valley into the Mediterranean.
articles.title: Israel orders evacuation of more southern Lebanese towns amid rising displacement

articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: Israeli forces widened their raid into northern Gaza, and tanks reached the north edge of Gaza City, pounding some districts of the Sheikh Radwan neighborhood, residents said, forcing many families to leave their homes.
articles.title: Israeli tanks deepen their push into the northern Gaza Strip

articles.author: David Alire Garcia
articles.description: An Argentine claim that European contact brought civilization to the Americas has provoked rebukes from across Latin America, where heated debates often flare up over the era's contested historical legacy.
articles.title: Columbus holiday in Latin America revives centuries-old historical debate

articles.author: Simon Lewis, Humeyra Pamuk
articles.description: After weeks of intensive diplomacy aimed at securing a ceasefire between Israel and Hezbollah militants, the United States has settled on an altogether different approach: let the unfolding conflict in Lebanon play out.
articles.title: Caught between competing goals in Lebanon, US stays on the sidelines

articles.author: Jasper Ward
articles.description: The United States said on Sunday it will send to Israel an advanced anti-missile system - and U.S. troops to operate it - in a bid to bolster the country's air defenses following missile attacks by Iran.
articles.title: US to send anti-missile system to Israel, says Pentagon

articles.author: Emilie Madi, Amina Ismail
articles.description: Tahani Yassine was in her third trimester of pregnancy when she chose to return to her hometown of Beirut to deliver her baby.
articles.title: Under bombardment, Lebanon's expectant mothers fear for their unborn babies

articles.author: Dave Sherwood
articles.description: Nobody is sure how many Cubans seeking U.S. shores are lost among the strong currents, treacherous weather and shark-infested waters of the Florida Straits.
articles.title: Cubans are disappearing at sea in migrant exodus, leaving a painful void

articles.author: Panu Wongcha-Um
articles.description: Southeast Asian leaders called on Sunday for swift agreement on a code of conduct for the South China Sea based on international law, while demanding an immediate halt to fighting in Myanmar and inclusive peace talks to end its civil war.
articles.title: ASEAN urges early accord on South China Sea code, end to Myanmar violence

articles.author: Elena Rodriguez, Raul Cadenas
articles.description: Thousands protested on Sunday in Madrid to demand more affordable housing amid rising anger from Spaniards who feel they are being priced out of the market.
articles.title: Thousands march in Spain to demand affordable housing
Iran reduces sentence of jailed journalists after clearing them of collaborating with US
